00001 package se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.management;
00002 
00003 
00004 import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.Diagnostic;
00005 import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
00006 import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource;
00007 import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.Diagnostician;
00008 
00009 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.management.exceptions.InvalidModelException;
00010 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.management.exceptions.InvalidObjectsTable;
00011 
00017 public class ModelValidator {
00018 
00019         Resource resource;
00020         InvalidObjectsTable invalidObjects;
00021         StringBuffer strBuffer;
00022         
00027         public ModelValidator(Resource resource) {
00028                 this.resource   = resource;
00029                 invalidObjects  = new InvalidObjectsTable();
00030         }
00031         
00036         public void doIt() throws InvalidModelException {
00037                 validateEachElement();
00038                 
00039                 if (! invalidObjects.isEmpty() ) {
00040                         throw new InvalidModelException( invalidObjects );
00041                 }
00042         }
00043 
00044         private void validateEachElement() {
00045                 for (EObject eObject : resource.getContents()) {
00046                         addToListIfInvalid(eObject);
00047                 }
00048         }
00049 
00050         private void addToListIfInvalid(EObject eObject) {
00051                 if (! validateEObject(eObject) ) {
00052                         invalidObjects.put(eObject, strBuffer.toString());
00053                 }               
00054         }
00055         
00056         private Boolean validateEObject(EObject eObject) {
00057                 Diagnostic diagnostic = Diagnostician.INSTANCE.validate(eObject);
00058                 if (diagnostic.getSeverity() != Diagnostic.OK) {
00059                         resetStringBuffer();
00060                         printDiagnostic(diagnostic, "");
00061                         return false;
00062                 }
00063                 return true;
00064         }
00065 
00066         private void resetStringBuffer() {
00067                 //I don't know how to reset a buffer, so I create a new one.
00068                 strBuffer = new StringBuffer(500);
00069         }
00070 
00071         private void printDiagnostic(Diagnostic diagnostic, 
00072                         String indent) {
00073                 recordIndentedMessage(diagnostic.getMessage(), indent);
00074                 for (Diagnostic child : diagnostic.getChildren()) {
00075                         printDiagnostic(child, indent + "  ");
00076                 }
00077         }
00078 
00079         private void recordIndentedMessage(String message, String indent) {
00080                 strBuffer.append(indent);
00081                 strBuffer.append(message);
00082                 strBuffer.append('\n');
00083         }
00084 }
